resonance.name: Enduring Rock
resonance.description: Increases shield strength by 15%. Additionally, characters protected by a shield will have the following special characteristics: DMG dealt increased by 15%, dealing DMG to enemies will decrease their Geo RES by 20% for 15s

reactions.name: Crystallize
reactions.description: Creates a shard of the involved element. Picking it up creates a shield of that element around the character
